content:
Q: Does Maid Protect360 PRO pay for COVID-19 related medical bills?
A: If your domestic helper is diagnosed with COVID-19 and hospitalised, we will reimburse the eligible medical expenses under Section 2 (Hospital & Surgical Expenses).
questions: What type of medical expenses does Maid Protect360 PRO cover for COVID-19?

Does Maid Protect360 PRO cover outpatient treatment for COVID-19?

Are there any exclusions related to COVID-19 in the Maid Protect360 PRO policy?
